title: BTCZtothemoon
author: BTCZtothemoon
content: Welcome to the TechGecko ($GECK) Community!We're thrilled to introduce TechGecko, a cutting-edge DeFi token set to redefine the crypto landscape. With a total supply of 10 billion tokens, here's a breakdown of our tokenomics:TechGecko ($GECK) is not just another cryptocurrency; it's a visionary leap into the future of decentralized finance. With a dynamic approach to tokenomics, we're rewriting the rules of the crypto game. Our ecosystem is designed to reward our community - from the 2% reflections on every transaction to the 1% set aside for both development and marketing, ensuring continuous innovation and widespread adoption. What sets us apart is our commitment to transparency, security, and above all, the unwavering support of our dedicated holders. As a gesture of gratitude, we're hosting an exclusive 1 Billion Token Giveaway for our presale contributors. This is your invitation to be part of something groundbreaking, something that could redefine the landscape of crypto. Join us on this exhilarating journey, and together, let's chart a new course in the world of decentralized finance. Don't miss out on being part of the TechGecko revolution!1% Dev Wallet: Ensuring continuous innovation and security.1% Marketing Wallet: Driving widespread adoption and recognition.2% Reflections: Rewarding holders with every transaction!Exclusive Presale Contributors Bonanza!To express our gratitude for your early support, we're hosting a massive giveaway:🎉 Total Giveaway Pool: 1,000,000,000 Tokens🔹 Every presale contributor will receive an equal share!🚀 Tokens will be distributed directly to your wallet after presale concludes.Don't Miss Out on the Future of DeFi!Get in early and be part of the TechGecko revolution. Join our community, contribute to the presale, and secure your share of the 1 billion token giveaway!Important Links:Website: https://techgecko.xyzTelegram: https://t.me/TechGeckoTwitter: https://twitter.com/TechGeckoTokenPresale: https://cookiesale.io/presale/0x5468023F5e74eC16518a3E7c572e9fCBa58AC1F7?chain=BSC🚀🌐 WhitePaper 🌐🚀https://my.visme.co/view/90jodd9g-geck-whitepaper-v1Stay tuned for more exciting updates!🌟 Exclusive Giveaway Details 🌟Dear valued presale contributors, we are thrilled to show our gratitude for your support. As a token of our appreciation, we're giving each participant an even share of 1 billion tokens!🎉 Here's How It Works:🔹 Total Giveaway Pool: 1,000,000,000 Tokens🔹 Every participant will receive an equal share of the total pool!🔹 Tokens will be distributed directly to your wallet after the presale concludes.🔹 No strings attached - your contribution automatically qualifies you!🚀 Thank you for being a part of our journey! Your trust means the world to us. Let's soar together to new heights in the world of crypto!🚀 Introducing $GECK 🚀Dive into the future of DeFi with $GECK! 🦎✨ Our tokenomics are designed for success:💡 1% Dev Wallet: Ensuring continuous innovation and security.📢 1% Marketing Wallet: Driving widespread adoption and recognition.💰 2% Reflections: Rewarding holders with every transaction!Invest in a project with purpose. comments.author: BTCZtothemoon
comments.body: Total Supply of GECK Staked: 33.17%Total Supply of GECK Burned: 1.74%UTILITY IS NOW LIVE:https://geckswap.com (WORLDS FIRST UTILITY) You've heard of POW and POS. Now we have POB (Proof Of Bag)Everytime you make a transaction on ANY dex and you hold the minimum 100m GECK tokens,Atm it is just GECK/BNB for testing but we are expanding to offer as many of the TOP tokens as possible.You will receive 100% of your BNB gas fees back in GECK tokens EVERY 6 HOURS!TechGecko introduces a groundbreaking feature within the DeFi space. With our $GECK token, users automatically receive $GECK tokens as a refund for incurred BEP-20 gas fees on every transaction. This innovation aims to redefine DeFi transactions by offsetting costs and rewarding user engagement.TechGecko Mechanism: Enhancing TransactionsUsing a proprietary smart contract, TechGecko seamlessly integrates with our DEX platform. When users make transactions, a portion of the gas fees is converted to $GECK tokens at market rates and returned to their wallets. This not only mitigates gas fee expenses but also encourages further platform engagement.Stats:TechGecko (GECK/WBNB)Dex: PancakeSwapPrice: $0.000001156 (+50.73% | 24h)Volume (24h): $10,163Transactions (24h): 429Holders Count: 287MarketCap: $115,641Liquidity: 36.94 WBNB ($7,584.Linktree:https://linktr.ee/techgeckoWe are revolutionizing the DEX space. Join us.
